attributes.action: MAKE MISLEADING PARLIAMENT A CRIMINAL OFFENCE.
attributes.additional_details: Many MPs who allegedly represent the electorate mislead Parliament for their own self-interests. They enjoy Parliamentary immunity from the criminal justice system but this has to stop. It is time they became accountable with a prison sentence laid down for the offence.
attributes.background: MAKE MISLEADING PARLIAMENT A CRIMINAL OFFENCE, PARLIAMENTARY IMMUNITY SACRIFICED FOR THE OFFENCE, WITH 18-MONTHS SUMMARILY IMPRISONMENT THE SENTENCE. THE SENTENCE TO BE SERVED IN FULL WITHOUT TIME OFF.
